ada(10) dinaye prakashayata pathkarana lada 2010 mulya wartha anuwa kisidu aayathanayakata barak nowi lanka widuli bala mandalaya rupiyal biliyana 05 ka mulyamaya labhayak athkaragena athi bawa niwedanayak nikuth karamin widuli bala ha bala shakthi amathyanshaya pawasayi. patali champika ranawaka amathyawaraya wisin ada perawaruwe pawathi madhya hamuwakadi awadharanaya kala paridi lanka widuli bala mandalaya wisin rajya ho paudgalika aayathanayakin yam miladiganimak, sewa labaganimak ho mulya ganudenuwakadi lanwima wisin gewiya yuthu mudalak we nam ema siyalu gewim sidukirimen anathuruwa 2010 lanwima mulya warshaya wenuwen rupiyal biliyana 05 ka shuddha labhayak laba athi bawa amathyanshaya penwadeyi. khanija thel sansthawata 2010 warshaya thula gewiya yuthu siyaluma gewim sidukara athi bawa da lanka khanija thel sansthawata siduwana paduwen 80%kma widulibala mandalayata adu milata indhana sapayima nisa siduwana bawa khanija thel karmantha amathyanshaya sidukala prakashayata prathichara dakwamin nikuth kala niwedanaye wadiduratath sandahanya. lanwima wisin 2010 agosthu 31 dakwa dawithel litarayak khanija thel nithigatha sansthawen rupiyal 26 ka mudalakata milatagath bawada in penwadeyi. ema amathyanshaye illimakata anuwa sakachchawakin pasu 2010 sapthambar 01 dina sita dawithel litarayak sandaha gewiya yuthu mudala rupiyal 40 dakwa ihala nanwu bawa widuli bala ha balashakthi amathyanshaya pawasayi. eya amathyansha mattamin maha bhandagaraye madihathwima matha labagath thiranayak bawa da sandahanya. 2009.12.31 dakwa eeta ihatha wasara kihipayaka khanija thel miladiganim wenuwen khanija thel sansthawata lanwima wisin gewiya yuthu rupiyal biliyana 62 ka mudala maha bhandagaraya wisin baragena athi bawa ema amathyanshaya nikuth kala niwedanayen dakwayi. ee anuwa ada dina prakashayata pathkala mulya wartha walata anuwa lanka widuli bala mandalaya kisidu aayathanayakata barak nowi rupiyal biliyana 05 ka labhayak laba athi bawa amathyanshaya wadiduratath thahawuru karayi.

kawadawak eya hirawela inna lankawatath sampath thibenawa.namuth mema chithrapata samaga sinhala chithrapata wala gunathmaka bawa sansandanathmakawa balana wita ahasata polawa wage.me chithrapataya thula dakunu indiyanuwan owun ge jathiye abhimanaya saha athitha paramparawe abhitha bawa mulu lowatama kiyapanna uthsaha karala thiyanawa.thrimana sa apata wuwamana une honda chithrapatayak hadanna mahacharya sunil aariyarathna kalakata ihathayi. 1995 "age wairaya" namathi pilikul sahagatha chithrapataya nisa eka digata hadunu "ragaye unusuma, salupata ahasata, ginigath madhusamaya, kama suthra, pathiniyage horawa, mangul sakwala, hadu wassak, seksi garl, surayahana gini gani, surangana yahana" yanadi wu "kama ralla" obata matha madurasiye panaputhra madurasiye panaputhra madurasiye panaputhra 2012 pebarawari 10 wani dina aluyama 4.05ta katunayaka bandaranayaka jathyanthara guwan thotupalin ahasata nagga mama eeta paya 1 miniththu 25kata pasu perawaru 5.30ta madurasiye chennayi jathyanthara guwan thotupalin indiyawata paya thabu na jayalath thamayiapita golu hadawatha osse premaye sundarathwaya kiya dunne.
